item.title: Senior Consultant - Community Platforms & Sustainability (Emerging Technology)
item.description:
Join our Team 

 

Interested in inventing the future?


 
You’re part of a team that will shape the evolution of communication, technology and value add services and help our clients stay connected to the people and things that matter to them most. The Sr. Consultant, Community Platforms & Sustainability focused on Emerging Technology is responsible for supporting the innovation, incubation and solution development of key next wave technologies that we need to position to the market. This is required to ensure protection, growth and transformation of our B2B customer base and allow entry to new markets.  This role will work in a matrix team – in collaboration with the CTO and other Business Units to maximize and evolve corporate investments and the TBS Emerging Technology Product team team to utilize the strength of dynamic partner and market segment partnerships to deliver the outcomes.

 

At TELUS, we are looking for people that like solving big problems in a team based organizational structure. We believe that our shared success is as much about what you bring to the table everyday as it is about your skills and qualifications. Smart, motivated people that work well in teams can move mountains!

 

TELUS is a great place to work. You can see it in our team members. The diversity of the TELUS team and their unique contributions set us apart from the competition. Our success is based as much on our future friendly team as the innovative internet, voice, data and wireless products and solutions we offer to consumer and the business markets.

 

Our team members include people like you - enthusiastic, innovative, passionate and energetic. We believe that you’ll find our high-performance culture personally fulfilling, professionally challenging and financially rewarding. 


Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together 

 

As the Senior Consultant for Emerging Technology PLT focused on Community Platforms & Sustainability with a focus on commercialization you will provide technical and services development expertise to support outcome development for the B2B organization - utilizing new technologies either in its standalone derivative or in combination to evolving digital solutions. The core emphasis for this role is to build a community platform (in a marketplace or business platform ecosystem configuration) to drive new lines of revenue, new ways of transacting with the small  business, medium-sized and enterprise segments. There is also a key need for expertise in using sustainability-focused capabilities and value prop to drive differentiation in the market that can start with B2B and can extend to B2C.  You will also work with our CTO, sales, internal stakeholders to develop business opportunities for the company. 

You\'re the ideal candidate with:

  • Strong background and expertise in Community Platform development (multi-network development, differentiation, and co-innovation) - planning and engineering in end to end, or disruptive supply and value chains. 
  • Strong background in marketplace platforms, business platforms (transactional and innovation platforms).
  • Strong consulting background on strategy, business and services development on Sustainability Solutions (strong entrepreneurial, commercialization background – focus is market outcomes development)
  • Strong Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) background: Strategy, Planning and Implementation
  • Strong Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) background: Strategy, Planning and Implementation
  • Strong background on sustainability solutions market incubation, innovation and commercialization.
  • Strong background in circular economy monetization and commercialization.
  • Strong consulting, solution development competencies in various technologies, services and industries. Emphasis on 3rd wave and Industry 4.0 solutions. 
  • Proven experience in business and enterprise architecture and design
  • Proven entrepreneurial mindset in the creation of solutions and translation to market products and services (business outcome/market sensitive)
  • Strong analytical abilities, financial acumen and strategic thinking
  • Strong pragmatic approach to problem solving driving solutions based on scenarios and time horizon
  • Strong background in systems thinking & design thinking 
  • Strong background on innovation and incubation tactics
  • Strong background in investment management. 
  • Very strong background in platform economy, data science and insights.  
  • Strong understanding and application experience in some if not all of the following emerging technologies:
    • Digital platforms/ecosystems: Next generation OSS, BSS and Others
    • Platform economy, transaction and innovation platform business models
    • Multi-cloud/Hyperscalers
    • Blockchain
    • Automated Intelligence and Machine Learning
    • Data and Visual Insights
    • Micro-Services/API as a service 
    • Others: 5G, Secure Access Service Edge, Mobile Edge Computing, SD-WAN, cybersecurity and NFV and IoT
  • Proven leadership in business development for horizontal and vertical market needs. 
  • Proven leadership in partner enablement and activation. 
  • Proven knowledge and leadership in vertical solution development and monetization.
  • Big picture thinker who can provide end-to-end oversight to typically silo-ed functions, great collaborator and can drive team based results (based on cross portfolio product functions). 
  • Ability to understand corporate business strategies and company’s goals, and apply this understanding to make systems/technology development decisions.
  • Excellent service and solution architecture planning skills. 
  • Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • Proven ability to drive negotiated outcomes while maintaining strong stakeholder relationships  
  • Strong writing and presentation skills to articulate ideas that involve interpretation, analysis, assessment and alignment.
  • Passion for excellence, strong work ethic and solutions-oriented


Your enthusiasm for learning and innovation, love of a challenge and leadership capabilities will be keys to your success.

 

    What you\'ll do in this role:

    • Develop solution based on emerging technologies to drive business/market outcome
    • Support innovation stream and incubation tactics to prove monetization and scaling of solutions 
    • Support solution selection through corporate investment maximization or validation through partner ecosystems
    • Support packaging solutions for segments, enable entry position for new/untapped markets 
    • Enable proactive benefits management 
    • Lead and influence high performance and collaboration in TELUS

     

     

    You\'re the missing piece of the puzzle:

    • At least 5+ years ESG, SDG and circular economy solutions development and commercialization.
    • At least 5+ years of technology and services consulting, solution and service development background.
    • At least 5+ years of experience in systems, data architecture applications.
    • At least 3+ years of experience in data science practice 
    • At least 3+ years of systems thinking, design thinking and UX background in solution development  
    • At least 5+ years of  strong frameworks knowledge and execution on pragmatic marketing, product management methodologies and processes
    • At least 5+ years, of financial analysis and business case development experience, strategy development methodologies. 
    • At least 5+ years, of strong background in IT architecture, delivery and operations. 
    • At least 5+ years, of strong IT Service Management practice experience: multi-tech and multi-organizational design competencies. 
    • At least 5+ years, Solid ITIL, TMF, TOGAF and PMP and Agile Product and Project Management background 
    • Have ISSP (Sustainability Excellence Associate or Sustainability Excellence Professional) certification.
    • Strong knowledge of wireless / fixed broadband, Telecom and non-Telecom IT applications, systems, platforms and services
    • Engineering, IT or related technical degree with MBA preferred, or MBA with strong technical background and demonstrated experience/competence working with IP, wireless and related technologies, or 5+ years business background in a technology industry with relevant experience in a product management or development role.


    What we give back to you:

    • Opportunities to excel and show your stuff – work on high value and high visibility projects – this is one of the top priorities within the TELUS Business Solutions team
    • Flexible work styles with the ability to work in and out of the office 
    • Work in an organization that actively supports your personal development with leading edge training and development tools
    • An environment that lets you be your best every day
    • Work in an organization that actively supports you giving back to the community you live in
    • Competitive pay & benefits 
    • A place that embraces our core values: 
      • Spirited team work
      • Courage to innovate
      • Embrace change
      • Initiate opportunity and a Passion for growth

item.title: Data Scientist - Data Analytics
item.description:
Join our team

 

Our Team – TELUS Business Solutions Marketing BI - has a mandate to build solutions for our stakeholders using data to drive business outcomes.  We love to turn data into stories - stories about money falling through the cracks, success stories about our products and services, but most importantly stories about our customers and how we can enhance their experience.

 

Come join our team if you have a passion for data, analytics, marketing, the courage to innovate, embrace change and embody spirited teamwork to support stakeholders across a wide variety of teams.

 

Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together

 

As a Data Scientist in the team, you will be working with Business Stakeholders and the campaign team to identify use cases, build machine learning models to protect the customer base, acquire new customers and to enable intelligent marketing campaigns.  Your solutions will have a direct impact on marketing sales targets and P&L.

 

Here’s how

 

  • You will build pipelines to bring data required to support the use case
  • You will develop new machine learning models to enable intelligent campaigns
  • You will productionalize machine learning models and automate processes
  • Collaborate with business stakeholders to enable new use cases for TELUS Business
  • Effectively communicate with leadership and stakeholders in explaining the model and outcomes

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle

 

  • You have experience leading large scale projects and  partnering with multiple stakeholders
  • You can manage ambiguity and change with a learning and growth mindset
  • You love digging into quantitative and qualitative data
  • You have experience working with customer data, building recommendation engines, personalized offer management, lifetime value and propensity modeling
  • You have experience in building machine learning algorithms 
  • You have worked with R/Python, SQL, spark, big data technologies or cloud
  • You have data engineering experience and ability to extract data from various sources
  • You have 5+ years of experience in a similar role and/or related education with demonstrated performance

 

Great to haves

 

  • Prior telecommunications or B2B marketing experience
  • Experience with Cloud / Salesforce technologies

item.title: E2E Data Analytics Architect
item.description:
Description

 

Join our team 
The Network architecture and convergence is a newly created, innovative team that is also responsible for cross-domain network architecture development covering cloud orchestration, network slicing, automation and assurance, data analytics and network exposure with holistic architecture alignment;  in addition to wireless/wireline convergence covering access, network, policy, subscriber data, provisioning and charging. With the fast evolving 5G ecosystem driven by rapid technological, regulatory, and customer demand changes, the level of uncertainty and complexity of this transformation is increasing. Still, the opportunities are greater today than ever before for industry players like TELUS. We are embracing disruption, reimagining network services capabilities, and driving growth by leveraging the latest technologies  

 

Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together 
You are a E2E network data analytics architect who prides yourself on leading digital transformation by introducing latest technology  of artificial intelligence and machine learning models. You truly believe in the adoption of IT and cloud orchestration and automation, and data analytics to drive intelligent network operation that enables the efficient and creative growth of wireless and wireline networks, while reducing costs. Finally, your passion and initiative in translating and applying your learnings in wireless and wireline communication networks will propel TELUS’ digital transformation.

 

Here’s how

  • You will lead the cross domain network analytics architecture, strategy, design, and align data analytics with automation, 5G network slicing, cloud, and 5G network 
  • You will develop/design E2E network data analytics framework applied to Radio, core, transport, service and cloud (hyper scaler) domains, to enable truly artificial intelligent network with machine learning capability
  • Through collaboration with multiple teams, you will drive innovation in automation, artificial intelligence, and big data analytics
  • Create business cases to secure necessary capital for overall cross domain network analytics 
  • You will work with other senior architects in order to identify the existing gaps in the network  to get fully automated network with predicative model by Lead the iterative development, validation, and deployment of AI/ML models

Qualifications

 

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle

  • Architecture and design experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP)/OpenShift Container Platform (OCP)/Amazon Web Services (AWS) and/or Azure products
  • Experience with containerization tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, and/or OpenStack technology and networking (CNI, Calico, Multus, VxLAN, vSwitch etc.)
  • Skilled in Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) tools, i.e. Spinnaker, Jenkins, GitHub Actions, GCP Cloud Build,  Jupyter etc
  • Machine learning open source frame work  (PyTorch, JAX and NumPy,TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, Pandas etc.)
  • 5+ years of relevant IT Architecture experience, advanced technical and analytical skills, and the ability to take responsibility for the overall technical direction of the project
  • Knowledgeable in one or more development/scripting languages and orchestration/API tools  (Java, YAML, Shell, Json, Python, Keras etc.)
  • Advanced knowledge in SQL and Apache Spark
  • Well versed in software and AI development lifecycles, including ML Ops
  • Knowledge of 5G network protocols and experience with network management are pluses
  • Expert knowledge of the software project lifecycle—from concept through design to implementation and test.
  • Proven track record of leading data analytics, 5G SA and automation projects
  • Creative approach to problem solving and an ability to work independently in an environment with high levels of ambiguity
  • Ability to manage key deliverables as part of an extended project team
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with an ability to translate complex technical concepts to non-technical audiences
  • A Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Systems or related field, Master’s preferred

 

Great-to-haves

  • 5+ years of telecommunications experience
  • Multi- or Hybrid-cloud architectures
  • Experience with Big Data & Analytics tools such as Kafka, Kinesis, Hadoop, Big Query, DataFlow, Pub/Sub, etc

item.title: Manager-Technology Strategy - Wireless Core Network and Services DevOps
item.description:
Description

 

Join our team

 

TELUS’ Wireless Core Network & Services Dev/Ops team is responsible architecture, deployment, optimization, and operations for technology platforms that support the national wireless core network. We have a unique opportunity for an engaging people leader to manage a software development team.

 

Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together

 

You will lead a team of engineers and software developers to transform to virtualized network functions, softwarize network services, and improve service reliability across core platforms. The team will work with our industry partners, both telco vendors and hyperscalers, to develop and operate wireless services including but not limited to system integration, software development, data analytics and automation. Your management skills, industry knowledge and technological leadership will shape TELUS’ next-generation networks and services.  Moreover, your natural abilities to collaborate with other teams such as Product and Sales will set you apart.

 

Here’s how

 

•    Coach, develop and inspire a diverse team of DevOps professionals
•    Solve problems and handle escalation in a collaborative and effective manner 
•    Set key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure individual and team successes
•    Build trust and partnership with internal/external stakeholders and lead customers
•    Develop and operate software solutions based on virtualized infrastructure and 5G 
•    Focus on reliability across critical user journeys
•    Using Agile engineering principles, you will lead the efforts to quickly adapt to new technologies, services and applications
•    With a constant focus on customer experience and industry trends, you will lead on-going improvements to our core to ensure the best customer experience every time, everywhere
•    Manage platform lifecycles, 3-year service roadmap and Capex/Opex budgets
•    Adopt principals of Reliability by Design, Security by Design and Privacy by Design

Qualifications

 

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle

 

•    Respected as a collaborative partner and trusted advisor who builds strong relationships across the organization and providing value add
•    Regarded as an excellent communicator, negotiator and influencer, able to communicate complex ideas and concepts to a variety of audiences including senior leaders in a clear, simple, easy to understand manner
•    Recognized for your Customer First mindset and delivering on optimal outcomes for both internal and external stakeholders
•    Sought out for your strategic thinking, business acumen, sound decision making and result-driven mindset with the ability to take initiative and ownership of complex issues through to resolution
•    Solid knowledge and understanding of:
o    Application integration models and methodologies
o    Agile development and DevOps methodologies
o    Application Development environments and technologies for delivering digital solutions
o    Software development and coding techniques 
o    Cloud native technologies and concepts
•    Proven business, financial and strategic skills with experience in assessing alternatives and business case development
•    Noted to have a high degree of curiosity, continuously learning new topics, concepts and technologies, and also looking beyond the surface level to understand the full picture and questioning/challenge the status-quo resulting to drive higher business value
•    Respected for your advanced knowledge of 3GPP (IMS/LTE/UMTS/HSPA) wireless core networks optimization and performance
•    Ability to interact with technical team members and distill complex ambiguous problems into actionable items
•    Experience negotiating with vendors for new technology and support agreements
•    Broad base of knowledge across IT and Network systems, support and processes
•    Bachelor\'s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field and/or relevant experience

 

Great-to-haves

 

•    Big data correlation and machine learning knowledge
•    Experience in web/mobile applications development
•    Master of Engineering degree and/or MBA

item.title: Strategy Manager
item.description:
Description

 

Join our team

 

TELUS is looking for a passionate and talented leader to join a highly skilled, dynamic advanced analytics team. You will collaborate and work with a team of data scientists responsible for developing robust models for predicting call center demand used to inform the wireline and wireless Customer Experience budget, strategic plans and monthly Triage activities. You will use your expert communication collaborating with various stakeholders from budgeting, operations, marketing, and project teams to drive alignment on key metrics, process efficiencies and develop data-driven insights and stories

 

Customer Experience AI, Data and Analytics Spotlight:

 

  • Our team works in a fun, innovative and challenging environment that directly influences the strategic direction and performance of the Customer Experience business
  • Our teams are responsible for the Demand Forecasting, Customer Intents, Behavioral Prediction, and Performance Analytics
  • We work closely with stakeholder teams to deliver on our strategic objectives; our key stakeholders and partners include Operations, Marketing, Finance, and Technology

 

 

Qualifications

 

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle

 

  • Strong Business Acumen and storytelling skills
  • Outstanding people leadership skills with a keen focus on developing and fostering an innovative and engaged culture
  • A strong background or knowledge of forecasting, statistics, data analytics, machine learning
  • Excellent interpersonal communication skills, ability to work with various levels of management up to and including Senior Management as well as work within multi-functional teams
  • Resourcefulness to identify opportunities and drive change with a sense of urgency
  • Ability to understand and integrate all internal and external drivers (i.e.: Finance, Economics, Operations, etc.) that impact problem solving and decision making
  • Ability to maintain a positive attitude despite high-pressure situations and manage multiple priorities within tight deadlines
  • Ability to be flexible and drive to resolution in a fast-paced and changing environment
  • Ability to provide and execute on actionable recommendations based on data analysis
  • Ability to communicate in a clear and concise manner with non-technical team members
  • Working knowledge of process improvement methodologies

 

Great-to-haves

 

  • Proficient with Microsoft Office software (Excel, Word, PowerPoint)
  • Experience with Google Office Suite (Sheets, Docs, Slides) would be an asset
  • Experience with statistical programing software such as Python would be an asset
  • Experience with SQL would be an asset
  • Strong knowledge of call center operations
  • University degree and/or 3-5 years equivalent combination of experience and education
  • CPA, MBA or MSc would be considered an asset

item.title: Senior Security Consultant - Secure by Design
item.description:
Description

 Join our team

 We live in a fast-paced cyber-world where protecting our information has become paramount. At TELUS Security, we strive to always be steps ahead, tackling the toughest security challenges head-on with top talent and cutting edge technology.
The Secure by Design (SbD) team enables TELUS, at an early stage of its project lifecycle, to build secure solutions by following a secure by design principled approach. We carry out thorough security assessments, identify risks and provide expert consulting by way of security control recommendations to technology and business partners. 
 
Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together  

As a Senior Security Consultant you will leverage your subject matter expertise in the field of cyber security to assess network/system/application design and implementation and offer consultation to enhance security postures. You will partner with IT architects, network engineers, and software developers across Mobility, Cloud, and IoT teams making a difference in protecting the availability, integrity, and confidentiality of TELUS services & information. In this specific role your key areas of focus would be security assessments for both TELUS & TELUS Health.
 

Here\'s How

Perform security threat and risk analysis, network, system and application-level security reviews on a wide variety of TELUS services, acquisitions and even product offerings which include Internet of Things ( IoT), Robotic Process Automations (RPAs) and Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning ( AI and ML) and Cloud. Assess network, system and application designs and implementations with a security lens to discover subtle security issues for unexpected threat scenarios including conducting all of these for TELUS Health systems too. Get the chance to collaborate with and liaise with many stakeholders, from the Privacy team to which you will provide data Subject Matter Expert (SME) recommendations, to project teams, solutions architects and technologists during their design phases to ensure Security is top of mind and up to industry standards.Apply security standards and best practices to recommend solutions for advanced information and network security requirements and plan, research & design information security into networks and systems with hands-on application of technical methods and techniques and policies and procedures.

Design and implement risk driven information and network security solutions and evaluate and design security and controls for new technologies to address such areas as infrastructure, security administration, user identification and authentication, data security, network and host intrusion prevention, detection and monitoring. Assist with and participate in the development of information, system and network protection policies, procedures, strategies and architectures to define and support TELUS’ information and network security programs while educating and coaching peer groups of architects and engineers on how to better design security into their various projects
 

Qualifications

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle

  • 5+ years cybersecurity experience in Health, Software, Telecom or IT industries
  • Distinguished for your intimate knowledge of information/network security technology, audit and control measures, monitoring/investigation methodologies and privacy/regulatory/criminal legislation
  • Recognized for your advanced knowledge of application security, systems security and network security in emerging technologies
  • Expert in understanding and application of major security standards, guidance, and frameworks based on NIST CSF, HIPAA, ISO/IEC 27000, OWASP, PCI, CIS, etc. to the realities of business and information security
  • Valued for your leadership skills:
  • Ability to influence decisions of peers/teams with technical authority and trust based relationships
  • Ability to technically direct/lead teams
  • Ability to build consensus in team environments and manage conflict while striving for shared goals and objectives
  • Ability to mentor junior team mgembers and aid in their development
  • Ability to make decisions with imperfect information
  • Ability to admit mistakes and bring correction and course change in a timely manner
  • Reasonably skilled in project management and system deployment methodologies
  • Commended for your excellent interpersonal and communication skills
  • With a university degree preferably in a technology related field
  • Regarded for one or more security or other applicable certifications such as CISSP; CISA; CISM; CRISC; ISO27000, ITIL
  • The candidate should have or be willing to undergo a Secret II clearance, due to the nature of their employment

Great to haves

  • 2+ years of operational, system administration, or infrastructure build and deployment in a security-focused environment, especially in environments pertaining to processing and storage of Health information (ePHI)
  • Knowledge of Health industry and associated network technologies (5-10 years)
  • Background in IT audit and technical project management (with a strong security component) will also be considered

item.title: Senior Technology Architect - Data Engineer
item.description:
Description

 

Join our team
 
The Data Strategy & Enablement team is on a continuous journey towards helping TELUS become a world-class leader in data solutions, doing so by delivering data analytics capabilities built upon unified scalable platforms, advanced AI tooling, high quality data, and a data-product and data platform oriented culture while always keeping an eye on the horizon, preparing for the next big thing. 
We are entrepreneurial and passionate, believers that so much more is possible and can be achieved by creating value and great outcomes for our customers, team members, communities, and environment and that through meaningful transformation we can integrate dynamic change in our professional lives.
 
 

Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together

 

The Data Strategy and Enablement team has started its journey towards enabling further digital transformation in our data and advanced analytics space. Composed of Data Engineers, Business Systems Analysts and Architects our team focuses on building and enabling best-in-class data platforms with a focus on migrating our assets from an on premise data lake to Google’s Cloud Platform.

Join a dynamic team that is paving the way towards digital transformation and enable teams across the organization to make better use of data. Make use of your analytical skills and ability to analyze and assess the impact of data on upstream and downstream systems and help clarify and define cloud-related business processes and best practices across TELUS. Help architect the transformation and modernization of our enterprise data solutions and the integration of Google Cloud and native GCP services and 3rd party data technologies.
 
 

Here’s how

 

  • Build data pipelines, provision infrastructure and secure reliable data-centric services and applications in GCP
  • Analyze data, build models and generate reports and visualization using Hadoop and Cloud infrastructure
  • Help integrate large datasets stemming from multiple data sources to be later used for data modelling
  • Identify opportunities for and implement automation in the development and production process to reduce upfront hands-on work
  • Capture issues with the data that impact key business drivers and relay them to the product management teams
  • Support the data pipelines feeding into our machine learning algorithms and models
  • Assist the extracting, loading, transforming, cleaning, and validating of data

 

 

Qualifications

 

You\'re the missing piece of the puzzle

 

  • You are recognized for your 8+ years of experience of IT platform implementation in a technical capacity
  • You are sought out for your 5+ years experience of Data Lake and platforms implementation with experience implementing and performance tuning Spark applications
  • Google Cloud Dataflow and Google BigQuery experience
  • You are respected for your experience in designing and deploying distributed, multi-technology, data processing systems (MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, HBase, Redis, MongoDB, Hadoop, Spark or others)
  • You bring systems design experience with the ability to architect and explain complex systems interactions, data flows, common interfaces and APIs
  • You bring a deep understanding of and experience with software development and programming languages and Python, Perl and Shell scripting
  • You are experienced with Apache, its ecosystem and relevant tools (Sqoop, Flume, Kafka, Oozie, Hue, Zookeeper, HCatalog, Solr, Avro)
  • You are familiar SQL-on- technologies (Hive, Impala, Spark SQL, Presto)

 

Nice to have

 

 

  • GCP Professional Data Engineering certification
  • DevOps practices and tools experience
  • Orchestration and job scheduling platforms experience

item.title: Sr Technology Cnslt
item.description:
Join our team

Your innovative mindset, technical skills, and passion for growth will be critical in helping TELUS continue to grow its data engineering and analytics practices and develop effective systems and applications. Be part of a supportive culture where the customer is front and center,
motivating us to continuously improve and provide innovative solutions.

Here’s how:

•    Help collect, consolidate, transport and analyze data and communicate alerts related to these 
•    Identify potential process and procedure enhancements, work on bug fixes and functionality gaps
•    Provide companywide technical leadership on multi-functional, complex systems
•    Collaborate and partner with various architecting, DevOps engineering and project management teams and vendors and internal clients
•    Ensure that the offered solutions are stable and reliable and offer the flexibility to promote revenue, meeting customer specific requirements and client business growth within TELUS all while ensuring that it remains best-in-class
•    Provide and implement architecture solutions that meet the team’s and customers’ business requirements

You’re the missing piece of the puzzle:
•    You are able to formulate strategic plans and to present them to senior leadership teams to secure buy-in
•    You are a forward thinker and use your technical expertise to drive business benefits and impact the bottom line
•    You are a relationship builder comfortable liaising with customers for systems, process and procedure improvements
•    You are a technical expert with core elements such as operating systems, databases and networks and knowledgeable of UNIX, Solaris, AIX, Linux and Windows
•    You are sought out for your programming and scripting skills and experience working in a DevOps environment
•    You are a self-directed, self-starting crystal clear communicator whether written or verbal and approach problems with an analytical mindset and problem solving skills
 

Additional factors that make you a great member to our team

•    University degree, ideally in Computer Science or Engineering
•    Java, Python, Perl, Bash and Shell scripting
•    Data Analytics skills and experience
•    Experience with Docker & Swarm
•    Experience using Machine Learning tools

Great to haves:

•    Splunk admin and data onboarding
•    GCP cloud monitoring and logging – Big Query and Cloud Logging
•    NiFi flow development, Kafka
•    Kubernetes (or Openshift)
•    Ansible Playbooks
•    Hadoop and Hive

item.title: Senior BI Cloud Data Engineer
item.description:
Join our team

 


We have an exciting opportunity for you to join our Business Intelligence team in Home Solutions Customer Experience. Our team uses data & analytics to support 15k global team members across a number of internal teams. We use data from over 10 million annual customer interactions to feed our BI & Customer Feedback solutions, and  support informed decision making across our Contact Centre and Field operations teams. You will be at the forefront as we work together to design and build the next generation BI platform based on the Google Cloud Platform using technologies and tools that will include SQL, Python, Bigquery, Looker, and Github.

 

 

Here’s the impact you’ll make and what we’ll accomplish together

 


Collaborating  with other technical team members, product owners, stakeholders and business leaders you will be part of a team that provides easy access to information for our internal teams. You’ll be a part of the evolution that will replace our existing Microsoft BI based solutions and transform how we use data and analytics at TELUS. This exciting journey will further help us to meet the needs of our customers and enable exceptional team member experiences and outcomes through easy access to data.

 


Here\'s how

 

You will be a valuable member of the team as you:

  • Partner with business primes to understand their business strategy and data goals, then work with them to  propose and implement capabilities that can achieve these outcomes
  • Provide technical expertise and guidance collaborating with other data and analytics professionals to design, build, and manage our data and analytics solutions (pipeline, storage, integration, analytics)
  • Collaborate with vendors and other technical teams across TELUS to ensure that our approach is coordinated and scalable for the future needs of TELUS
  • Be curious, stay current on top developments in cloud technology and machine learning and identify opportunities to use these approaches to drive a data centric culture

You\'re the missing piece of the puzzle

 


Don’t worry if you don’t yet meet every requirement below. We are looking for an experienced team member with a curious and collaborative mindset combined with solid data solution engineering skills.
 
Are recognized for your technical and analytical skills with experience in: 

  • Architecting and implementing next generation data and analytics platforms on Google Cloud Platform 
  • Design and implementing ingestion and curation functions on Google Cloud Platform using GCP native or custom programming 
  • Planning and building semantic layer (business logic) capabilities using Big Query and/or LookML (or equivalent technologies)

 
You have had opportunities to leverage your:

  • Database knowledge and experience with establishing pipelines and data marts across different database platforms
  • Strong understanding of dimensional modeling concepts – facts vs. dimensions, surrogate keys, and data granularity
  • Knowledge of SQL including writing, debugging and tuning T-SQL queries, creating SQL tables, views and stored procedures and a strong understanding of relational databases

 
Known for your ability to bring people together:

  • Mentoring and helping fellow team members develop their technical capabilities and progress in their careers
  • Being comfortable with working within tailored delivery methodologies based on what best suits a project and team (Agile, Kanban etc.)
  • Articulating and communicating technical approaches and information to a business orientated audience
